WRITING.TEXT: I hope we can also sign dadanov or shipachev or both, get rid of plecks, flynn, mitchell and king, replace with martinsen mccaron maybe dalton thrower theres a much better checking line i think...we never give our youngster the shine or playing time they deserve

Hmmmmm....i hope so..all the experts are saying de la rose...there are better vets that would be worth alot more picks..if think about it why would they do that when they can take a young nhl ready youngester...its not worth taking on plecks 4+ million..i bet he retires
Im guessing either de la rose or hudon...that sucks thinking about that, why is brain flynn on the team, buy him out and put hudon on entry level.
Yea but an expansion team isnt looking to win their 1st year, and no one expecta them too. It would make sense to take some young talent for a 3/4 year rebuild.

WRITING.TITLE: Just a thought?!?
